name: Windows 8
description:
Personalized. Make your Start screen your personalized home for the things you care about. Organize and customize it the way you want. 
Connected. Now everything is in one place and easier to share. Integrate your online favorites—Facebook, Flickr, Hotmail, etc.—with content from your PC, such as photos and contacts. 
Touchable.The new Windows 8 has been redesigned for touch but still works great with a mouse and keyboard. 

Features
Beautiful, fast, fluid
Start up quickly
Customize your Start screen with Live Tiles
Browse faster with Internet Explorer 10
Stay safer with Windows Defender
Get great apps at the Windows Store
Plus Mail, Photos, SkyDrive and more built-in 

Ready for business:
Encrypt your data with BitLocker
Connect to company networks with Domain Join
Plus, virtualize with Client Hyper-V
System Requirements:To install Windows 8 Pro, customers must be running Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista, or Windows 7, 1 GHz processor, 2 GB RAM, 20 GB available hard disk space, 1366 x 768 screen resolution, DirectX 9 graphics processor with WDDM driver, Internet access (fees may apply), Microsoft account required for some features, Watching DVDs requires separate playback software, Windows Media Center license sold separately

Please note the following:

1. Terms and Conditions at Paypal ‘s Note - I, a buyer, am paying for purchasing the product/s, I understand that absolutely each sale is final and I cannot / will not dispute any payments. The payment is final and won't be disputed.

2. You will receive the Key via email within 2-48 Hours.

3. This is a KEY ONLY product.

name: Windows 8 Media Center Pack
description:
If sold out, payments will be refunded.

Product Key Received from Microsoft to allow Windows 8 PRO (ONLY) to be able to add on the Media Center Pack which allows you to play and watch media. It also allows you to watch and record Live TV. 

PLEASE NOTE: This does NOT upgrade Windows 8 to Pro, it only lets people ALREADY WITH Windows 8 Pro to be able to add on the Media Center Pack.

Please note the following:

name: Windows 7
description:
Introducing Windows 7. Your PC, simplified.

You told us what you wanted in the next version of Windows and we listened. We designed Windows 7 to simplify your everyday tasks, work the way you want, and make new things possible.

name: Windows XP Professional
description:
Microsoft Windows® XP Professional Edition sets the standard in efficient, dependable computing. Whether you want to share a file, printer or internet connection with co-workers, or configure a wireless network for your office, Windows XP Professional provides the technology foundation to help you grow your business.

name: Microsoft Office for MAC or PC
description:
Microsoft Office is an office suite of desktop applications, servers and services for the Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X operating systems, introduced by Microsoft on August 1, 1989. Initially, a marketing term for a bundled set of applications, the first version of Office contained Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, and Microsoft PowerPoint
